title: Dallas Mavericks ' revenue 2001 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016/17 and 2017/18.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 307.0 was reported at Year 2018/19
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 105.0 was reached at Year 2001/02
